name: Tales of Esferia: Araxis
description:
Two intergalactic freelancers, Jacob and Ethan, are on a routine travel through space delivering supplies to faraway galaxies. On their way back home they make one last stop to a small, remote planet. There they meet a group of researchers who are studying the planet and trying to figure out its mysterious history.

Not everything is quite as it seems, though.

Strange things start to happen and no-one really seems to know what is going on or who or what is behind everything. But one thing is sure, Jacob and Ethan can not leave.


Key Features
  • a story-driven non-combat adventure
  • puzzles with varying difficulties
  • over 50 maps to explore
  • two playable characters
